question: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations?
oriSent: The current Secretary-General of the United Nations is António Guterres of Portugal.

question: When did António Guterres take office as Secretary-General?
What position did Mr. Guterres hold prior to becoming Secretary-General?
phrase: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
predAns: Assistant Secretary-General for the Department of Economic and Social Affairs
oriSent: Prior to his appointment as Secretary-General, Mr. Guterres served as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from June 2005 to December.

question: What has Mr. Guterres centered his efforts on?
oriSent: He has centered his efforts on ensuring human dignity for all.
